Package nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.util.implementations

Class PLocationSpigot

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.bigdoors.spigot.util.implementations.PLocationSpigot
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPLocation
public final class PLocationSpigot extends Object implements IPLocation
Represents an implementation of IPLocation for the Spigot platform.
Author:
Pim
